name: Personalized Basic Robot Brain
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Screwdriver" "150922" #L "Robot Junk" "42619" #L "Bio Analyzing Computer" "156021" #L "MasterComm - Personalization Device" "156024" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Screwdriver + Robot Junk = #L "Nano Sensor" "150924" Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Bio Analyzing Computer + Nano Sensor = #L "Basic Robot Brain" "156023" Skills: | EE | ------------------------------ MasterComm - Personalization Device + Basic Robot Brain = #L "Personalized Basic Robot Brain" "156027" Skills: | EE | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ This nifty little thing costs quite a lot to make and only gives a little bit of sense when equipped. However, it can useful for equipping Sense/Agi armors.
